title: 1984년 Mitchell v. Superior Court 사건
summary: 미국 California, CA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Mitchell v. Superior Court. 판결일: 1984-12-20. 법원: California Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: GARY A. MITCHELL Et Al., Petitioners, v. THE SUPERIOR COURT OF FRESNO COUNTY, Respondent; SHELL OIL COMPANY Et Al., Real Parties in Interest
**판결일**: 1984-12-20
**법원**: California Supreme Court
**관할**: California, CA

**판사**: Broussard

## 변호인

Counsel, Stemple & Boyajian, Michael A. Kramer, Gerald H. B. Kane, Jr., and Richard F. Gerry for Petitioners., Leonard Sacks, Jean Corey, Al Schallau, Wylie A. Aitken, Harlan Arnold, Glen T. Bashore, Ray Bourhis, Richard D. Bridgman, Edwin Train Caldwell, Victoria De Goff, Douglas K. deVries, Sanford M. Gage, Ian Herzog, G. Dana Hobart, Stanley K. Jacobs, Harvey R. Levine, John C. McCarthy, Timothy W. Peach, Robert H. Sulnick, Arne Werchick and Stephen I. Zetterberg as Amici Curiae on behalf of 

## 인용

- 691 P.2d 642
- 37 Cal. 3d 591

## 판결문 요약


37 Cal. 3d 591 (1984)
691 P.2d 642
208 Cal. Rptr. 886
GARY A. MITCHELL et al., Petitioners,
v.
THE SUPERIOR COURT OF FRESNO COUNTY, Respondent; SHELL OIL COMPANY et al., Real Parties in Interest.
Docket No. S.F. 24727.
Supreme Court of California.
December 20, 1984.
*594 COUNSEL
Stemple & Boyajian, Michael A. Kramer, Gerald H.B. Kane, Jr., and Richard F. Gerry for Petitioners.
Leonard Sacks, Jean Corey, Al Schallau, Wylie A. Aitken, Harlan Arnold, Glen T. Bashore, Ray Bourhis, Richard D. Bridgman, Edwin Train Caldwell, Victoria De Goff, Douglas K. deVries, Sanford M. Gage, Ian Herzog, G. Dana Hobart, Stanley K. Jacobs, Harvey R. Levine, John C. McCarthy, Timothy W. Peach, Robert H. Sulnick, Arne Werchick and Stephen I. Zetterberg as Amici Curiae on behalf of Petitioners.
No appearance for Respondent.
Sedgwick, Detert, Moran & Arnold, Stephen W. Jones, Berridge R. Marsh, Marie Sovey Silveira, Hardin, Cook, Loper, Engel & Bergez, Gennaro A. Filice III, Matthew S. Conant, O'Connor, Cohn, Dillon & Barr, Mark Oium, Glenn A. Friedman, Landels, Ripley & Diamond, James A. Bruen, Stephen C. Lewis and Deborah J. Schmall for Real Parties in Interest.
OPINION
BROUSSARD, J.
Petitioners, plaintiffs below, seek a writ of mandate ordering respondent superior court to vacate its order compelling plaintiff Bette Gae Mitchell to answer certain questions propounded to her by defendant real parties in interest at her deposition, which she declined to answer on instructions of...
